Author: rail
Name: BeastieBuddy
Punchline: A searchable mob database with spawn locations for Beastmaster, Blue Mage, or hunts
Description: A searchable list of all mobs and their known locations, using community data. Use /bbuddy to open, or search with /bbuddy <mob_name>.
Changelog:
v1.3.1.0:API 14, 7.4
v1.3.0.0: Added visual guidepoint on overworld, toggleable. Added command line search (e.g. /bbuddy <mob_name>).
v1.2.0.0: Added the Blue Mage Spellbook tab! You can now browse, search, and track all Blue Mage spells and their sources.
v1.1.1.1: API 13/Patch 7.3 update.
